channel.title: Code on Mohammed Zeeshan Ahmed's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Code on Mohammed Zeeshan Ahmed's Blog

item.title: First - Move to hugo
item.description: Hi, I have been using wordpress as my blogging platfom for some time now. While its an ageing platform, it served a very awesome purpose. Now, however, its time to move into something newer, that allows me greater freedom, to be awesome + github yay !! For now, until i can figure out the moving part, I am keeping older blogs back there. You can read them on my old blog.
